shelly theme export

Export current theme

Synopsis

Export the current theme configuration to a file.

Exports the base theme name, any custom color overrides, and the effective colors (what you actually see). The exported file can be imported back with ‘shelly theme import’.

If no file is specified, outputs to stdout.

item.title: shelly theme list
item.description:
shelly theme list

List available themes

Synopsis

List all available color themes.

The CLI includes 280+ themes from bubbletint. Use –filter to search for themes by name pattern (case-insensitive).

Use ‘shelly theme set ’ to apply a theme. Use ‘shelly theme preview ’ to see a theme before applying.

Output is formatted as a table by default. Use -o json or -o yaml for structured output suitable for scripting.

Columns: Theme (name), Current (checkmark if active)

item.title: shelly theme semantic
item.description:
shelly theme semantic

Show semantic color mappings

Synopsis

Show the current semantic color mappings for the active theme.

Semantic colors provide consistent meaning across the CLI:

  • Primary/Secondary: Main UI colors
  • Success/Warning/Error/Info: Feedback colors
  • Online/Offline/Updating/Idle: Device state colors
  • TableHeader/TableCell/TableAltCell/TableBorder: Table styling
